meanings.definition: A soft twilled fabric made of fine wool.
meanings.sent1: She wore a cozy casimere scarf to keep warm in the winter.
meanings.sent2: The tailor used casimere to create a luxurious coat for the customer.
meanings.sent3: The playful kitten snuggled up on the soft casimere blanket.
meanings.sent4: The moonlight draped the hills in a silvery casimere glow.
meanings.sent5: The touch of casimere against her skin felt like a gentle hug.

meanings.definition: A garment made from casimere fabric.
meanings.sent1: He proudly displayed his new casimere suit at the event.
meanings.sent2: The elegant dress was crafted from the finest casimere material.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled a rabbit out of his casimere top hat.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as warm and comforting as a cozy casimere sweater.
meanings.sent5: The casimere coat wrapped around her like a protective shield against the cold.
